channel.title: Personals on Joel Becker
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Joel Becker

item.title: My Favorite Things
item.description: These are a few of my favorite things. Using this table, you can browse: My product recommendations. My favorite holiday spots. My favorite passion fruit-based product finds. And much more besides. Please get in touch if you share a love for something on this list or have a recommendation!

item.title: Fitness advice for someone exactly like me
item.description: I’m occasionally asked for fitness advice. (Credentials at the end.) Here it is, with one small caveat: for best results, you should be exactly like me. I am not promising methods that fit most people’s goals! My advice might be helpful to the extent that you: Care about appearances at least as much as other fitness goals (health, flexibility, strength, etc.). Are happy to do non-weightlifting sports no more than twice per week.

item.title: My favorite passion fruit products
item.description: This list is a work-in-progress. In descending order of preference: Passion Fruit - agua de maracuya This “Passion Fruit” is a smoothie place in La Condesa (CDMX) that sells, among other treats, passion fruit juice by the bucket. My favorite passion fruit product of all time! I love that it isn’t too sweetened, and that the seeds have separated from the juice. The only problem is the large blocks of ice that they put in the buckets.
One day, once I have long-term security in where I live, I want to open a series of cafes. Sauna and ice baths cafe. Dog cafe. Plant shop cafe. Austrian delicatessen-cafe. Napolitan cafe.

Following many others, here are some things I recommend buying because they give me considerably more value than I paid for them. US immigration lawyers Dungarees Spare laptop batteries Many replacement chargers Large pill box Cerave skincare products Fulfil bars Only the ~200 calorie ones; the ~150 calorie ones are crap imitations. Yogurt with great macros Trampolining Sauna and ice baths
